Load the packages:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(Hmisc)
library(mice)
library(patchwork)
library(gridExtra)
theme_set(theme_bw(12))
```

Import the datasets in the wide and long formats:

```{r}
long <- read_rds(here("case_studies", "pi_hiv", "pi_hiv_data_long.rds"))
wide <- read_rds(here("case_studies", "pi_hiv", "pi_hiv_data_wide.rds"))
```
